entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 2:27 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -15.6°C
Wind: NNE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:13 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 1:13 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
